items.title: Is the Coros Nomad really an adventure watch?

items.title: 9to5Toys Steals Weekly – 7-card Apple Find My wallet $25, illuminated USB-C cable $8, tomtoc electronics bag $17, more
items.summary:
Welcome to 9to5Toys Steals Weekly – your go-to spot for already-affordable everyday essentials that are now selling for even less. This weekly roundup pulls together all of the Steals from the past week, and puts them in a digestable list for you to consume every Saturday morning. While many of the Steals over the past week have came and went along with Prime Day, some are still live. The most popular include this 7-card Apple Find My wallet with MagSafe at $25, a 100W braided USB-C cable with Atmosphere Light down for $8, and also tomtoc’s electronics bag at $17. As usual, you can find all of these and all of the rest down below.

items.title: All of the titles confirmed for Switch 2 GameCube library: Zelda Wind Waker, Mario Sunshine, F-Zero GX, more [Update #2]
items.summary:
Update 8/13: This post has been updated with the official release date for Chibi-Robo!

The My Nintendo Store Switch 2 pre-order invites have gone out and that means the first chance to score one of the new wireless GameCube controllers has too, but the actual Switch Online GameCube library won’t launch until June 5 when the Switch 2 does. Nintendo announced that it would be bringing GameCube to its classics library for Switch Online + Expansion Pack members alongside the Switch 2, but there are a few things you need to know about it and we’ll have a look at all of the games we know are coming to the service thus far down below.
